onboarding_answers.main_focus: i used to be a historian, then i was a teacher, i tried being an entrepeneur, would like to be an artist and regisseur, try my hand at developing both code and other things, am working as a cultural scientist and will be a professor.
onboarding_answers.top_projects: Nationen Schreiben - my dissertation, Verwaltungsgeschichte - historic work for and about bureaucracy, being prof. b3 and sending back messages from the future
